contentencoded: Deborah Amos is a foreign correspondent for National Public Radio, and former host of American RadioWorks. She spent a decade working in television news and has won some of journalism’s most prestigious awards. Amos is the author of four books. Her latest is titled, Eclipse of the Sunnis: Power, Exile and Upheaval in the Middle East.

title: Interview with Deborah Amos

Deborah Amos is a foreign correspondent for National Public Radio, and former host of American RadioWorks. She spent a decade working in television news and has won some of journalism’s most prestigious awards. Amos is the author of four books. Her latest is titled, Eclipse of the Sunnis: Power, Exile and Upheaval in the Middle East.
